external_games.name: Trainz Plus DLC - Chesapeake & Ohio K3-K3a 2-8-2

name: Trainz Plus: Chesapeake & Ohio K3-K3a 2-8-2
summary: Drive the Chesapeake & Ohio's K-3 and K-3a Mikado locomotives. With 63inch drivers, 28in by 32in cylinders, and a 200PSI boiler, the K-3 and K-3a locomotives exerted 67,698pounds of tractive effort, providing plenty of power to haul goods trains.
